columns.Musical_ID: A unique identifier for each musical entry in the table.
columns.Name: The title of the musical.
columns.Year: The year in which the musical was released or recognized.
columns.Award: The name of the award for which the musical is nominated.
columns.Category: The specific category within the award for which the nomination is made.
columns.Nominee: The individual nominated for the award in the specified category.
columns.Result: The outcome of the nomination, indicating whether the nominee won or was simply nominated.

musical.table_description: The table contains records of musicals along with their nominations, the awards they were nominated for, the categories of those awards, the nominees, and the results of the nominations.

columns.Actor_ID: A unique identifier for each actor in the database.
columns.Name: The name of the actor performing in the musical.
columns.Musical_ID: A reference identifier that links to the specific musical the actor is associated with.
columns.Character: The name of the character portrayed by the actor in the musical.
columns.Duration: The time period during which the actor has been performing in the specified character role.
columns.age: The age of the actor, providing demographic information.

actor.table_description: This table stores information about actors involved in musicals, including their performance roles, associated musicals, and actor demographics.
